story.title: Beneath Your Mask - Episode 5
story.storyDescription: An anonymous admirer is texting Heather at a costume party‚Ä¶
story.creator: web-uploader

author.bio: Chris Marie Green writes hot contemporary romance (like ‚ÄúBedroomies‚Äù!) plus urban fantasy. She also loves devouring pop culture and avoiding international incidents while traveling.

story.prePaywallNotification: Did Nightwing just text Heather‚Äîeven though they said they‚Äôd be a one-time thing? üòç Tap into Hooked to see if Heather gives him a text back.
story.postPaywallNotification: OMG‚ÄîHeather IS going to text Nightwing back!! üéâüéâTap back into Hooked to see what she says.

messages.text: SOS!
Nightwing texted, but I think I‚Äôve got too many hormones and beer in me right now to resist him!
Um, weren‚Äôt you at your Mom‚Äôs for dinner?
I understand where the beer might‚Äôve come in but‚Ä¶what about the hormones?
It‚Äôs a long story that involves Mom‚Äôs new ‚Äúserious‚Äù boyfriend and his three sons.
WHOA. Heather‚Äôs first orgy?
You wish. I had a beer with one of the sons.
And by ‚Äúbeer‚Äù you mean that you Nightwinged him?
You‚Äôre having an amazing week!
Nothing like that went on with Connor.
Jeez, his dad is dating my mom.
I‚Äôm just saying he was cute ‚Äî REALLY cute ‚Äî and he got my motor running.
For NIGHTWING.
Um‚Ä¶I kinda want to keep talking about this Connor guy.
No thanks. I know he was just messing with me when he asked me out for a drink.
Squee!
No. He‚Äôs WAY out of my league.
Don‚Äôt say that.
It‚Äôs true. What hot guy would hit on me when I‚Äôm not in my Captain America get up?
In case you forgot, there are guys who‚Äôve been into you when you‚Äôre not dressed up.
Yeah, but it never lasts.
Once they find out that I‚Äôm just being outgoing when I first meet them‚Ä¶it‚Äôs done.
Sigh.
Are you ready to talk about Nightwing now?
I‚Äôm here.
Okay. So Nightwing asked me what other costumes I have‚Ä¶
So that tells me he‚Äôs fine with another cosplay encounter.
He obviously doesn‚Äôt want anything more than that.
Ergo, he agrees with me about keeping it all fantasy, no reality.
A minute passes.
Jen?
Don‚Äôt get me wrong ‚Äî because I still think you should get yourself some Nightwing‚Ä¶
But you‚Äôre only running toward that fantasy because a real guy hit on you tonight.
I just think you‚Äôve got an opening here, Heather.
It‚Äôs obvious you‚Äôre interested in Connor‚Ä¶
Nope.
God, your last breakup really made those shields creep back up again!
Maybe it did. Anything else you want to school me on?
As a matter of fact, yes.
Not too long ago, I was lying to MYSELF about how I truly felt about Adam.
I was scared to death to step out of my fantasies about him.
I couldn‚Äôt confront the reality of how crazy we were about each other.
That was different.
HOW?
And YOU were the one who lectured me about how I was blowing it with him!
That‚Äôs why I finally dropped my defenses and went for it. I haven‚Äôt looked back since.
You can do the same thing, Heather!
Heather looks out the window at the passing city.
She swallows back the emotion in her throat.
Jen, unlike you, I‚Äôm not looking for love. I don‚Äôt need it.
I wasn‚Äôt built for it.
All I want is a little more superhero action, and then I‚Äôm moving on.
Okay. Then go get it.
But this whole costume thing is bound to get real old for you.
Someday you‚Äôre going to realize you need something more.
Whatever. Heather knows that she‚Äôs just fine on her own.
With her pulse throbbing, she opens the thread with Nightwing and texts him.
You want to know what other costumes I‚Äôve got?
I just happen to have a closet full of them‚Ä¶
And some are villains you‚Äôre constantly chasing.
THERE she is.
I thought you might be ignoring me tonight, even after you made all those soft, little sounds for me at that party.
Heather blows out an agitated breath.
She just wants fantasy, not reality‚Ä¶
But back to those costumes‚Ä¶
What do you want to know about them?
I‚Äôm just fantasizing about what you‚Äôd look like in other super suits.
And I also can‚Äôt help obsessing about what you‚Äôd look like OUT of them.
Oh boy‚Ä¶
I wasn‚Äôt talking about stripping the costumes off of you, even though‚Ä¶
YES.
I was talking about what you might look like in real life.
I keep imagining you as someone who‚Äôs a boss, and that‚Äôs such a turn on.
I thought real life was out of bounds with us. But‚Ä¶
Sinking down in the car‚Äôs backseat, Heather bites her lip and stirs in restless longing.
Maybe I‚Äôll throw you just one hint.
Do it, Cap. Make me happy like I made YOU happy the other night.
Heather flushes from her head to her toes.
All right. I work in an office, although someday I‚Äôd like to run my own business.
I‚Äôve got an idea for a geek hangout app‚Ä¶
Never mind. My last boyfriend never wanted to hear about it.
The guy who had you so bummed out at the costume party?
Stop dwelling on him.
I told you your ex must‚Äôve been insane to let you go.
Jeez, you sure know how to talk to the ladies. Where did you learn that?
You know me, Cap. I‚Äôve had encounters with a lot of women, both good and evil.
Said the hottest superhero ever.
I‚Äôm serious.
And I‚Äôm tired of going from one girl to the next.
Heather‚Äôs heart thuds and pumps, marking the seconds as they go by.
What is he trying to tell her?
Are you still speaking for Nightwing?
Or is this reality again?
Something about you intrigues me‚Ä¶
It draws me in, but I can‚Äôt put my finger on it.
That‚Äôs the real reason I can‚Äôt stop thinking about you, Cap.
Heather panics. She feels her shields go up.
Hah-hah. I‚Äôm pretty sure you just can‚Äôt stop thinking about what we DID at that party.
As amazing as that was, you‚Äôre wrong. This isn‚Äôt about sex.
It‚Äôs always about sex. I‚ÄôM sure that you‚Äôre just seeing a fantasy.
You don‚Äôt know me, and that‚Äôs how it‚Äôs got to stay.
Okay. Then if you want more fantasy, I‚Äôve got a place for us to meet tomorrow night.
What do you say, Cap?
Heather holds the phone close to her chest as if it can slow down her pounding heart.
Should she risk another skin-to-skin encounter with Nightwing?
Or should she play it safe on her own‚Ä¶?
